summary:
Inspired by LotR elven outfits - Elven dresses by Naihaan Kragnaidael

- 4 colorful elven dresses, 3 belts and four pairs of shoes for UNP body.
- 2 elven dresses for CBBE body in black and white.
- Optional white Wedding Dress replacer.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][size=+7]
[color=#5235A1]E[/color][color=#54349C]l[/color][color=#573397]v[/color][color=#5A3292]e[/color][color=#5D318D]n[/color][color=#632F84] [/color][color=#662E7F]D[/color][color=#692D7A]r[/color][color=#6B2C75]e[/color][color=#6E2B71]s[/color][color=#712A6C]s[/color][color=#742967]e[/color][color=#772862]s[/color][color=#7A275D] [/color][color=#7D2659]b[/color][color=#802554]y[/color][color=#82244F] [/color][color=#85234A]N[/color][color=#882245]a[/color][color=#8B2141]i[/color][color=#8E203C]h[/color][color=#911F37]a[/color][color=#941E32]a[/color][color=#971D2D]n[/color]
[/size][/center]


[size=+1][color=#9932CC]Author:[/color][/size] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/638056]Naihaan Kragnaidael[/url]
English translation and upload to Skyrim Nexus is made by Urshi with Naihaan's permission.

[size=+1][color=#9932CC]Licensing/Legal:[/color][/size]
- The assets in this upload may not be used, modified or reuploaded under any circumstances without author's expressed permission.
- Concerning Elvish Dresses for UNP V1.0_Fixed: if you want to make a retexture or use any part of that mod in any way - you have to contact Naihaan about permission and wait for her reply.
- If Naihaan doesn't reply to your message - your permission request is concidered to be denied, under no circumstances author's silence or author's absence from The Nexus can be interpreted as a permission to use the contents of this upload as resource material.
- Concerning the White and Black Elven dresses for CBBE body V0.3: these meshes are still in beta stage, so you can't use them at all, not until they are fixed. No retextures, no conversions, no mixes. NOTHING. Period.

[size=+1][color=#9932CC]How to contact the author of this mod:[/color][/size]
- You can PM [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/638056]Naihaan Kragnaidael[/url] on Skyrim Nexus.
- You can send an email to naihaan(at)yandex.ru
- You can PM the author on the forums wiotes.ru, anvilbay.ru, or any other russian TES site, under the nickname Naihaan.

[center][size=+3]
[color=#5235A1]D[/color][color=#573397]e[/color][color=#5D318D]s[/color][color=#632F84]c[/color][color=#692D7A]r[/color][color=#6E2B70]i[/color][color=#742967]p[/color][color=#7A275D]t[/color][color=#802553]i[/color][color=#85234A]o[/color][color=#8B2140]n[/color][color=#911F36]:[/color]
[/size]

[size=+1]There are 2 mods in this upload:

1. [u]Elven dresses for UNP:[/u][/size][/center]
Standaalone mod, adds 4 dresses, 3 belts and 4 pairs of shoes into the game. All the items are craftable at tanning rack. For [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?]UNP body[/url]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/39922-1-1376469685.jpg[/img]

[size=+1][center]2. [u]White and Black Elven dresses for CBBE[/u][/size][/center]
Standalone mod, adds 2 craftable (Misc category) dresses - Wedding dress and Mourning dress into the game. The dresses are made for [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE Slim body[/url]. These dresses are also avaliable as a replacer for the games default Wedding dress. If you want replacer version - download the archives in the Optional Files section.
[img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/39922-1-1384370728.jpg[/img]

[size=+1][color=#9932CC]Versions:[/color][/size]
Elvish dresses for UNP: V.1.0_Fixed
White and Black Elven dresses and Wedding Dress Replacer for CBBE: V.0.3

[size=+1][color=#9932CC]Requirements:[/color][/size]
1. Skyrim version 1.9.32.0 or higher is required for both standalone versions, but not for Wedding Dress replacer version.
2. [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666]CBBE female body replacer[/url] or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709//?]UNP female body replacer[/url]

[center][size=+3]
[color=#5235A1]H[/color][color=#55339B]o[/color][color=#583296]w[/color][color=#5B3190] [/color][color=#5F308B]t[/color][color=#622F85]o[/color][color=#652E80] [/color][color=#682D7A]g[/color][color=#6C2B75]e[/color][color=#6F2A6F]t[/color][color=#72296A] [/color][color=#762865]i[/color][color=#79275F]t[/color][color=#7C265A] [/color][color=#7F2554]i[/color][color=#83234F]n[/color][color=#862249] [/color][color=#892144]g[/color][color=#8C203E]a[/color][color=#901F39]m[/color][color=#931E33]e[/color][color=#961D2E]:[/color]
[/size][/center]
All the items are craftable.

[u]Elvish dresses for UNP:[/u]: craftable at tanning rack. You can also get them via console commands:

1. Enter the console by pressing ~ key and type: [color=#9932CC]help "Arwen"[/color] including the quotation marks and hit enter
2. note the desired item's ID number
3. then use console command formula: [color=#9932CC]player.additem [itemIDnumber] [quantity][/color]
4. Done. The item is added to your inventory.

[u]White and Black Elven dresses for CBBE:[/u] craftable at the forge under Misc category. You can also get them via console commands:
1. For White Wedding dress - enter the console by pressing ~ key and type: help "Wedding dress" and hit enter. Note the desired item's ID number
2. For Black Mourning dress - enter the console by pressing ~ key and type: help "Mourning dress" and hit enter. Note the desired item's ID number
3. Then use console command: player.additem [itemIDnumber] 01 without brackets.
4. Done. The item is added to your inventory.

[u]White Wedding Dress Replacer for CBBE:[/u]
Either make the Dark Brotherhood quest [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Bound_Until_Death]Bound Until Death[/url], or use the console command: player.additem 00088956 01 and hit enter. The dress then will be added to your inventory.


[center][size=+3]
[color=#5235A1]I[/color][color=#54349D]n[/color][color=#563399]s[/color][color=#583295]t[/color][color=#5B3192]a[/color][color=#5D318E]l[/color][color=#5F308A]l[/color][color=#612F86]a[/color][color=#642E83]t[/color][color=#662D7F]i[/color][color=#682D7B]o[/color][color=#6A2C77]n[/color][color=#6D2B74] [/color][color=#6F2A70]a[/color][color=#712A6C]n[/color][color=#732968]d[/color][color=#762865] [/color][color=#782761]u[/color][color=#7A265D]n[/color][color=#7C2659]i[/color][color=#7F2556]n[/color][color=#812452]s[/color][color=#83234E]t[/color][color=#85234A]a[/color][color=#882247]l[/color][color=#8A2143]l[/color][color=#8C203F]a[/color][color=#8E1F3B]t[/color][color=#911F38]i[/color][color=#931E34]o[/color][color=#951D30]n[/color][color=#971C2C]:[/color]
[/size][/center]

Make your life easy and use NMM! [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/modmanager//?]Get Nexus Mod Manager here[/url]
If you want to install both main files with NMM choose to install normally by clicking "NO" and then click "YES" to overwrite the files.

[color=#9932CC]Manual Installation:[/color]
1.Drop the contents of the unpacked archive into your skyrim/data folder.
2.Activate the NN_ElvishDresses.esp in your launcher.
3.Enjoy!

[color=#9932CC]Manual Uninstallation:[/color]
Delete the files associated with the mod.

[center][size=+3]
[color=#5235A1]B[/color][color=#54349C]u[/color][color=#573398]g[/color][color=#5A3293]s[/color][color=#5C318F] [/color][color=#5F308A]a[/color][color=#622F86]n[/color][color=#642E81]d[/color][color=#672D7D] [/color][color=#6A2C79]i[/color][color=#6C2B74]n[/color][color=#6F2A70]c[/color][color=#72296B]o[/color][color=#742867]m[/color][color=#772862]p[/color][color=#7A275E]a[/color][color=#7C2659]t[/color][color=#7F2555]i[/color][color=#822451]b[/color][color=#84234C]i[/color][color=#872248]l[/color][color=#8A2143]i[/color][color=#8C203F]t[/color][color=#8F1F3A]i[/color][color=#921E36]e[/color][color=#941D31]s[/color][color=#971C2D]:[/color]
[/size][/center]

- Clipping, which can become even more obvious if the character is using non vanilla animations, or different body replacer than the recommneded ones.

- The belts are rigid and unbending. They can look very weird when the character sits or uses non vanilla animations or poses (like PinUp poser mod etc.)

- Obviously, the Wedding Dress replacer is incompatible with any other mods that alters Skyrim's vanilla Wedding dress meshes in any way (via ESP, or directly by replacing the meshes). It should be fully compatible with NPC clothes texture overhauls, even if they alter wedding dress textures, the meshes in the mod have their own textures.


[center][size=+3]
[color=#5235A1]T[/color][color=#55339A]h[/color][color=#593294]a[/color][color=#5D318E]n[/color][color=#612F87]k[/color][color=#642E81]s[/color][color=#682D7B] [/color][color=#6C2B74]a[/color][color=#702A6E]n[/color][color=#742968]d[/color][color=#772761] [/color][color=#7B265B]c[/color][color=#7F2555]r[/color][color=#83234E]e[/color][color=#872248]d[/color][color=#8A2142]i[/color][color=#8E1F3B]t[/color][color=#921E35]s[/color][color=#961D2F]:[/color]
[/size][/center]
